page.title: 16LOWER HEATH SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: I got up at{6.30am}got dressed.When Dad had milked Gladys (our cow)we fed the calves.Then I took Gran her milk. At 7.15am Dad went to work.Then I had Weetabix for breakfast.I{biked}to {school}at 8.30am.At 8.40 I put my things in the cloakroom and went out to play{football}The bell went at 9.00 .We did Diary.At 9.40am we did Maths.I was doing multipication.After{Maths}it was 10.40am playtime.More football. After play we did our{Canal work.}At 12.00 we had school dinner{(sausages, {beans and chips).}Then we went to Moreton Say for a{football match.}We won 4-1.After a story I{cycled}home at 3.30.I played with my brother outside. At 4.45pm we went indoors,played with our tractors and watched "Connections" on{T.V.}After tea I helped Dad to feed the calves.Then I watched T.V. until bedtime.I read until 9.00.Then Islept.
